name: Demon Nun
description:
Welcome to evil nun horror escape.

Scary demon nun keeps you locked in the abbey.
You must find a way to unlock the door and get out from there.
Beware of the nun on day 2...
She hears everything.
You must solve valak puzzles to get out from the house.
You can hide in bathroom or bedroom.
You only have 5 days in conjuring the horror escape games.

Download now for FREE!
